english.segment1: You're my best friend. In spite of flaws. I can't believe You're always there. You hear my prayers. You are my rock. You harbor truth. I can see you're light shine everywhere. Its all around me
english.segment2: You never judge me for my faults. Your love is unconditional. Without I don't know where I'd be
english.segment3: Chorus. Jesus is..the sweet sweet love. of my soul. Jesus is..the only thing. making me whole. He's everything to me. All I desire to be. Thats what Jesus is. That what Jesus is
english.segment4: Sweet comforter. You ease my mind. Always beside me constantly. You never leave me
english.segment5: And You know me oh so well. Better than I know myself. And Your word is all that I believe
english.segment7: You spark the heavens light. The stars that shine at night. Here with You. It feels like home
english.segment8: Jesus Is..the healer of my heart. when it breaks. Jesus is..Fogiveness. when I makea mistake. He's all that I believe. He's everything I need. Thats what Jesus is
english.segment10: He's all that I believe. He's every breath I breathe. That's what Jesus is. Thats what my Jesus is
